page.title: 20THE BORSTAL IN HATFIELD
page.content:
After daily duties they watch t.v.till 9 p.m.or the lads can go to Thorne baths to help the Polio swimmers.The uniform is jeans,shirt and overalls,and on visiting days,it's trousers,tie,shirt and jacket.The parents visiting days are Saturday_Sunday,when it's possible for them to be escorted,to town between 10 a.m._4 p.m.
ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS HATFIELD HIGH SCHOOL: STAFF MRS P CASSIDY, MR D GREENHALGH, MR M VICKERS PUPILS ..G HENTON, T COOPER, I DRAKE, D SCOTT, D NICHOLSON, M COOPER, B FOX, R TULLY, C PRESS, M JONES, J SANDS, N ANDERTON, J GIBSON.
